EmailTemplate.description: Discontinued Enrolment for Failure to Re-Enrol
EmailTemplate.name: Discontinued Enrolment for Failure to Re-Enrol
EmailTemplate.subject: Discontinued Enrolment for Failure to Re-Enrol - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Student,
Attached is an official letter on Termination of your Enrolment in line with the earlier Notice of Termination sent to you on 04/01/2016.
We would like to take this opportunity to wish you the very best in your future endeavours.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
